name: Test

fields.name: KEY_CANVAS_URL
fields.description: Represents the canvas app URL key in the ApplicationContext.

fields.name: KEY_DEVELOPER_NAME
fields.description: Represents the canvas app developer or API name key in the ApplicationContext.

fields.name: KEY_DISPLAY_LOCATION
fields.description: Represents the canvas app display location key in the EnvironmentContext.

fields.name: KEY_LOCATION_URL
fields.description: Represents the canvas app location URL key in the EnvironmentContext.

fields.name: KEY_NAME
fields.description: Represents the canvas app name key in the ApplicationContext.

fields.name: KEY_NAMESPACE
fields.description: Represents the canvas app namespace key in the ApplicationContext.

fields.name: KEY_SUB_LOCATION
fields.description: Represents the canvas app sublocation key in the EnvironmentContext.

fields.name: KEY_VERSION
fields.description: Represents the canvas app version key in the ApplicationContext.

methods.name: mockRenderContext
methods.signature: public static Canvas.RenderContext mockRenderContext(Map<String, String> applicationContextTestValues, Map<String, String> environmentContextTestValues)
methods.description: Creates and returns a test Canvas.RenderContext based on the provided application and environment context parameters.

params.name: applicationContextTestValues
params.description: Specifies a map of key-value pairs that provide mock application context data. Use constants that are provided by Canvas.Test as keys. If null is provided for this parameter, the canvas framework will generate some default mock application context values.

params.name: environmentContextTestValues
params.description: Specifies a map of key-value pairs that provide mock environment context data. Use constants provided by Canvas.Test as keys. If null is provided for this parameter, the canvas framework will generate some default mock environment context values.

methods.name: testCanvasLifecycle
methods.signature: public static void testCanvasLifecycle(Canvas.CanvasLifecycleHandler lifecycleHandler, Canvas.RenderContext mockRenderContext)
methods.description: Calls the canvas test framework to invoke a CanvasLifecycleHandler with the provided RenderContext.

params.name: lifecycleHandler
params.description: Specifies the CanvasLifecycleHandler implementation that you need to invoke.

params.name: mockRenderContext
params.description: Specifies the RenderContext information that you need to provide to the invoked CanvasLifecycleHandler. If null is provided for this parameter, the canvas framework will generate and use a default mock RenderContext.

description: Contains methods for automated testing of your Canvas classes.
